Trade/Device Name(s): ELITech Clinical Systems CREATININE PAP SL
ELITech Clinical Systems URINE CONTROL BI-LEVEL
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra Pro Series Analyzers
ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra ProM Analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELITech Clinical Systems CREATININE PAP SL, ELICAL 2 calibrator, ELITROL I and II controls, and URINE CONTROL BI-LEVEL for quantitative creatinine measurement in serum, plasma, and urine
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative in vitro diagnostic determination of creatinine in human serum, plasma, and urine on ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra Pro Series Analyzers; creatinine measurements are used in diagnosis and treatment of renal diseases, monitoring renal dialysis, and for calculating other urine analytes
